title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: If you have anything else you want to ask,

whatIsPayMatch.question: What is PayMatch?
whatIsPayMatch.answer: PayMatch is a Swiss QR-bill invoicing platform designed specifically for Swiss businesses. It helps you create, send, and reconcile Swiss QR-bill compliant invoices effortlessly, with built-in payment matching and Swiss tax compliance features.

whoCanUse.question: Who can use PayMatch?
whoCanUse.answer: PayMatch is designed for Swiss businesses, freelancers, and SMEs who need to create Swiss QR-bill compliant invoices. We support businesses in Switzerland, Germany, France, and Italy, with plans for individual freelancers and enterprise teams.

pricingPlans.question: What pricing plans do you offer?
pricingPlans.answer: We offer three main plans: Free (5 invoices/month), Freelancer (CHF 5/month, unlimited invoices), Business (CHF 50/month, team features), and Enterprise (CHF 150/month, unlimited users). All prices include Swiss VAT.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Simply visit our registration page, enter your business details, and verify your email address. You can start with our free plan and upgrade anytime. We require basic business information for Swiss compliance.

changePlan.question: How do I change my plan?
changePlan.answer: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime from your account settings. Changes take effect at the next billing cycle. Downgrades may require data migration depending on your current usage.

cancelSubscription.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancelSubscription.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. Your account will remain active until the end of your current billing period. You can export your data before cancellation.

billingInvoices.question: Where can I find my billing invoices?
billingInvoices.answer: All billing invoices are available in your account settings under "Billing History". You can download PDF copies and view payment status. Invoices are also sent to your registered email address.

createInvoice.question: How do I create a new invoice?
createInvoice.answer: Click "Create Invoice" in your dashboard, fill in the client details, add line items, and the system will automatically generate a Swiss QR-bill compliant invoice. You can preview before sending.

invoiceTemplates.question: Can I customize invoice templates?
invoiceTemplates.answer: Yes! You can customize your invoice templates with your logo, colors, and company branding. We provide several professional templates that comply with Swiss invoicing standards.

invoiceLanguages.question: What languages are supported for invoices?
invoiceLanguages.answer: We support German, French, Italian, and English for invoice creation. The Swiss QR-bill section is automatically generated in the appropriate language based on your client's location.

recurringInvoices.question: Can I create recurring invoices?
recurringInvoices.answer: Yes, you can set up recurring invoices for regular clients. Set the frequency (monthly, quarterly, yearly) and the system will automatically generate and send invoices on schedule.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you support?
paymentMethods.answer: We support all major Swiss payment methods including bank transfers, credit cards, and digital wallets. Payments are processed securely through Stripe with Swiss banking integration.

paymentMatching.question: How does payment matching work?
paymentMatching.answer: Upload your CAMT.053 bank statement files and our system automatically matches incoming payments to outstanding invoices. You can also manually match payments or set up automatic rules.

paymentReminders.question: Can I send payment reminders?
paymentReminders.answer: Yes, you can send automated payment reminders at customizable intervals. Set up reminder schedules and the system will automatically send follow-up emails for overdue invoices.

refundProcess.question: How do I process refunds?
refundProcess.answer: Refunds can be processed directly from the invoice details page. You can issue partial or full refunds, and the system will automatically update the payment status and generate refund receipts.

browserSupport.question: Which browsers are supported?
browserSupport.answer: PayMatch works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your preferred browser for the best experience.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: PayMatch is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that works on mobile devices. You can install it on your phone's home screen for a native app-like experience with offline capabilities.

dataExport.question: Can I export my data?
dataExport.answer: Yes, you can export all your data including invoices, clients, and reports in various formats (PDF, Excel, CSV). Data export is available from your account settings and is GDPR compliant.

apiAccess.question: Do you provide API access?
apiAccess.answer: API access is available for Business and Enterprise plans. Our REST API allows you to integrate PayMatch with your existing business systems and automate invoice creation.

qrBillCompliance.question: Is PayMatch Swiss QR-bill compliant?
qrBillCompliance.answer: Yes, all invoices generated by PayMatch are fully compliant with Swiss QR-bill standards (ISO 20022). We automatically include all required elements and ensure proper formatting.

vatHandling.question: How does VAT handling work?
vatHandling.answer: PayMatch automatically calculates Swiss VAT based on your business type and invoice details. We support standard (7.7%), reduced (2.5%), and zero-rate VAT as per Swiss tax regulations.

taxReporting.question: Can I generate tax reports?
taxReporting.answer: Yes, PayMatch generates comprehensive tax reports for Swiss authorities including VAT returns and annual summaries. Reports are formatted according to Swiss tax office requirements.

dataRetention.question: How long do you keep my data?
dataRetention.answer: We retain invoice data for 10 years as required by Swiss law, account data for 7 years, and payment data for 7 years. You can request data deletion after the legal retention period.

gdprCompliance.question: Are you GDPR compliant?
gdprCompliance.answer: Yes, PayMatch is fully GDPR compliant and also adheres to the Swiss Federal Data Protection Act (FADP). We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.

swissComplianceHomepage.question: Is PayMatch compliant with Swiss invoicing regulations?
swissComplianceHomepage.answer: Yes, PayMatch is fully compliant with Swiss invoicing standards. We generate proper Swiss QR-bills that meet all legal requirements, including correct VAT calculations and mandatory information fields.

currenciesSupported.question: What currencies does PayMatch support?
currenciesSupported.answer: PayMatch supports Swiss Francs (CHF) and Euros (EUR), which covers the majority of Swiss and European business transactions. All currency conversions and calculations are handled automatically.

paymentReconciliationHomepage.question: How does payment reconciliation work?
paymentReconciliationHomepage.answer: You can upload CAMT files from your bank or connect your bank account for automatic sync. PayMatch will automatically match incoming payments to your invoices based on amount, reference number, and other criteria.

dataSecurityHomepage.question: Is my data secure and GDPR compliant?
dataSecurityHomepage.answer: Absolutely. PayMatch uses bank-level encryption and is fully GDPR compliant. Your financial data is stored securely in Switzerland and we never share your information with third parties without your explicit consent.

teamCollaborationHomepage.question: Can I use PayMatch for team collaboration?
teamCollaborationHomepage.answer: Yes! Our Business and Enterprise plans include team collaboration features. You can invite team members, assign roles, and work together on invoice management and client relationships.

freePlanLimitsHomepage.question: What happens if I exceed my free plan limits?
freePlanLimitsHomepage.answer: If you exceed 5 invoices per month on the free plan, you can upgrade to a paid plan at any time. We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit and provide easy upgrade options.

getStartedHomepage.question: How do I get started with PayMatch?
getStartedHomepage.answer: Simply sign up for free and create your first invoice in under 2 minutes. No credit card required for the free plan. You can start invoicing immediately and upgrade when you need more features.

customizeInvoicesHomepage.question: Can I customize my invoices?
customizeInvoicesHomepage.answer: Yes! You can add your company logo, customize colors, and create professional invoice templates. Business and Enterprise plans include advanced branding options.

supportOfferedHomepage.question: What kind of support do you offer?
supportOfferedHomepage.answer: We offer email support for all plans, with priority support for Enterprise customers. Our support team is knowledgeable about Swiss invoicing regulations and can help with any questions.
